entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 70 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
